content: + media title 1 **construction** this knit dumpling is knit seamlessly from the center out beginning with just 8 stitches and expanding through lifted increases to create a round flat base after reaching full width half of the stitches are worked flat to form the folded picot hem the remaining live stitches are then grafted together with kitchener stitch to shape the body with stuffing added as you close the seam finally the picot edge is refined with light seaming and a small embroidered crease **finished dimensions** gauge is not critical for this project but for reference the dimensions after stuffing and closing are width 9 cm height 4 cm thickness approx 2 3 cm depending on stuffing **skills required** working in the round on double-pointed needles * working flat * stitch increases * yarn overs yo and paired decreases k2tog * kitchener stitch 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=zx2tgzq2fdg
